name: Shelled Shinobi
description:
Shelled Shinobi

Alternate between classic platforming and controlling a fast sliding shell.

Design, programming, art, animation, music, and sfx by me.
Thanks to Nerdy Teachers, Krystman, Gruber and Trasevol Dog for tutorials.

At the moment I consider the project a WIP / prototype, but I'm working on other stuff in between. Some to-dos: Jump buffering, more levels with new mechanics and better music.

Controls:
The web player should also work on most mobile browsers (virtual Pico-8 controls).
Controller (suggested)    /    Keyboard:
Move:    D-Pad, Left joystick    /    Arrow keys
Shell:    ❎ (Xbox / Pico-8)    /    X or V
Jump:    🅰️ (Xbox) or 🅾️ (Pico-8)    /    C or Z
